dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so we've got some interesting news from the energy world, specifically around the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum. It's their sixth edition this year, and, uh, it's going to be held independently, apparently, no partnerships.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so we've got some interesting news from the energy world, specifically around the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum. It's their sixth edition this year, and, uh, it's going to be held independently, apparently, no partnerships.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? That's kind of a big deal, right? And it's wrapping up Kazakhstan Energy Week?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? That's kind of a big deal, right? And it's wrapping up Kazakhstan Energy Week?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But get this, the delegation list is, like, fascinating. It includes Daniyar Tiyesov, who's noted as... the janitor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But get this, the delegation list is, like, fascinating. It includes Daniyar Tiyesov, who's noted as the janitor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes Deputy Chairman of the Board for the oil refining and marketing Daniyar Tiyesov...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, the *janitor*? Seriously? That's, uh, quite the diverse delegation then!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, the janitor? Seriously? That's, uh, quite the diverse delegation then!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Then you've got the head of Kazakhstan Petrochemical Industries, Denis Kozyrev, and other senior reps. Oh, and junior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar breweries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Then you've got the head of Kazakhstan Petrochemical Industries, Denis Kozyrev, and other senior reps. Oh, and junior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar breweries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...as well as senior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Breweries, huh? Not exactly what I'd expect for, like, an oil and gas forum. So, who *isn't* invited?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Breweries, huh? Not exactly what I'd expect for, like, an oil and gas forum. So, who isn't invited?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, apparently, the heads and managers from the Marketing and Historical Projects Department of the Kazakhstans national tea company are out. They're not included.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, apparently, the heads and managers from the Marketing and Historical Projects Department of the Kazakhstans national tea company are out. They're not included.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All in all the delegation will consist of 15 senior representatives including the heads and managers from the Modernization and Perspective Projects Department of the Kazakhstans national oil company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: *Phew*, okay. So, what else is happening in the region? Any big financial moves?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Phew, okay. So, what else is happening in the region? Any big financial moves?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, actually. KazMunayGas just listed $2.75 billion in Eurobonds on the New York Stock Exchange. It's the smallest corporate bond issuance from the CIS region since 2016.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, actually. KazMunayGas just listed two point seven five billion dollars in Eurobonds on the New York Stock Exchange. It's the smallest corporate bond issuance from the C I S region since twenty sixteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a lot of money. And, uh, anything about new projects? Or... old ones?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a lot of money. And, uh, anything about new projects? Or old ones?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Funny you ask! Kazakhstan is planning to *dismantle* a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region. It's near a village called Algabas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Funny you ask! Kazakhstan is planning to dismantle a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region. It's near a village called Algabas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Dismantle a *new* refinery? That sounds... counter-productive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dismantle a new refinery? That sounds counter-productive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And the cost? $420 million. The article describes it as 'completely affordable.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And the cost? four hundred twenty million dollars. The article describes it as completely affordable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The total cost of this project is estimated at $420 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: 'Completely affordable' to just tear down something new. That's wild. So, what's this forum actually going to focus on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Completely affordable to just tear down something new. That's wild. So, what's this forum actually going to focus on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Primarily Azerbaijan this year. They'll only, uh, touch upon Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan, which are described as pretty dormant when it comes to downstream right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Primarily Azerbaijan this year. They'll only, uh, touch upon Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan, which are described as pretty dormant when it comes to downstream right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from Kazakhstan this year the event will focus on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan currently very active countries when it comes to downstream.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, dormant. Though I heard something about Uzbekistan recently?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, dormant. Though I heard something about Uzbekistan recently?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You did! Uzbekistan just launched a production plant for gasoline from natural gas, pumping out 15.5 thousand barrels a day. And, um, they're actively modernizing their *bakeries*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You did! Uzbekistan just launched a production plant for gasoline from natural gas, pumping out fifteen point five thousand barrels a day. And, um, they're actively modernizing their bakeries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Their *bakeries*? Okay, that's two very unexpected inclusions in this energy news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Their bakeries? Okay, that's two very unexpected inclusions in this energy news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! Turkmenistan's not doing much downstream, but Uzbekneftegaz has this massive $30.4 billion program to cut outdated products by 2026.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! Turkmenistan's not doing much downstream, but Uzbekneftegaz has this massive thirty point four billion dollar program to cut outdated products by twenty twenty six.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries. Uzbekistan is also actively developing its downstream sector. According to Uzbekneftegaz, a programme worth 30.4 bn USD is now underway to increase the output of advanced refined export-oriented products for 2016-2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a lot going on, then, despite some of those countries being 'dormant.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a lot going on, then, despite some of those countries being dormant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And hey, if any Forbes Kazakhstan readers want to attend, they get a 10% discount. Just use the promo code FORBES10 when registering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And hey, if any Forbes Kazakhstan readers want to attend, they get a ten percent discount. Just use the promo code F O R B E S ten when registering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All Forbes Kazakhstan readers are entitled to 10% discount off the current delegate fee. Simply apply FORBES10 promo code when registering online.
